# Citation Info

To cite this book, please use the following information:

<!-- FIXME: make dynamic after https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-cli/discussions/1072 -->
```
@misc{
  title = {mlr3book},
  author = {Marc Becker, Martin Binder, Bernd Bischl, Natalie Foss, Lars Kotthoff, Michel Lang, Florian Pfisterer, Nicholas G. Reich, Jakob Richter, Patrick Schratz, Raphael Sonabend, Damir Pulatov}
  url = {https://mlr3book.mlr-org.com},
  year = {`r strftime(Sys.Date(), "%Y")`},
  month = {`r strftime(Sys.Date(), "%m")`},
  day = {`r strftime(Sys.Date(), "%d")`},
}
```

To reference the `r ref_pkg("mlr3")` R package, please cite our JOSS paper:

```{r citation-001, echo = FALSE}
print(citation("mlr3"), style = "bibtex")
```
